column4: Hi all having trouble with a script....its one line to tar and compress and another to reverse it. I can't get it to reverse..any ideas - http://paste.ubuntu-nl.org/51804/
can't use ~ in a script...put in the whole path
yes, I believe so....it is the ~ in the last line that is th eproblem...change it to $BACKUPDIR and I thnk it will work
